verses.roman:
'ādi-vasyā' ei strīre nā kara varjana
karuka yatheṣṭa jagannātha daraśana

synonyms: ādi-vasyā—uncivilized; ei—this; strīre—woman; nā kara varjana—do not forbid; karuka—let her do; yathā-iṣṭa—as desired; jagannātha daraśana—seeing Lord Jagannātha.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said to Govinda, "O ādi-vasyā [uncivilized man], do not forbid this woman to climb the Garuḍa-stambha. Let her see Lord Jagannātha to her satisfaction."

purport.content: For an explanation of the word ādi-vasyā, refer to Antya-līlā, Chapter Ten, verse 116.
